## Description {#details}

An analysis to compute the <code>PointerTypes</code> for pointers in a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a></code>.

Since this analysis is only run during codegen and the new pass manager doesn&#39;t support codegen passes, this is wrtten as a function in a namespace. It is very simple to transform it into a proper analysis pass. This code relies on typed pointers existing as LLVM types, but could be migrated to a custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> if <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype">PointerType</a> loses typed support.

<SectionDefinition>
